code: @Manual{,   title = {strava: Strava API},   author = {Tyler Littlefield},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/tyluRp/strava, https://tylurp.github.io/strava/}, }

title: Strava API
text: goal strava access strava API R.

title: Strava API
text: Create API application personal strava account, read : https://developers.strava.com/docs/getting-started/ store following credentials .Renviron file can find usethis::edit_r_environ: STRAVA_ID STRAVA_SECRET Refresh R session make request: first time make request, asked authorize. authorization, token cached memory future requests current session.
code: library(strava)  # can only authenticate in interactive session if (interactive())    get_gear()  # an example response of the above request would be: strava_data$gear #> $id #> [1] "b10826293" #>  #> $primary #> [1] TRUE #>  #> $name #> [1] "Roubaix" #>  #> $nickname #> [1] "Roubaix" #>  #> $resource_state #> [1] 3 #>  #> $retired #> [1] FALSE #>  #> $distance #> [1] 537801 #>  #> $converted_distance #> [1] 334.2 #>  #> $brand_name #> [1] "Specialized" #>  #> $model_name #> [1] "Roubaix" #>  #> $frame_type #> [1] 3 #>  #> $description #> NULL #>  #> $weight #> [1] 20 #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "strava_gear" "list"

title: Strava API
text: responses get_ family functions tidy procedure attempts flatten response table.
code: tidy(strava_data$gear) #> # A tibble: 1 × 12 #>   id     primary name  nickname resource_state retired distance converted_dista… #>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr> <chr>    <chr>          <chr>   <chr>    <chr>            #> 1 b1082… TRUE    Roub… Roubaix  3              FALSE   537801   334.2            #> # … with 4 more variables: brand_name <chr>, model_name <chr>, #> #   frame_type <chr>, weight <chr>

title: Get Activity — get_activities
text: Returns given activity owned authenticated athlete. Requires activity:read Everyone Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all activities.

title: Get Activity — get_activities
code: get_activities(   id,   include_all_efforts = NULL,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: Get Activity — get_activities
text: id identifier activity. include_all_efforts include segments efforts. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Activity — get_activities
text: activity's detailed representation. instance DetailedActivity.

title: Get Activity — get_activities
code: if (FALSE) {   get_activities(7255352296) }

title: List Activity Comments — get_activities_comments
text: Returns comments given activity. Requires activity:read Everyone Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all activities.

title: List Activity Comments — get_activities_comments
code: get_activities_comments(   id,   page = 1,   per_page = 30,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: List Activity Comments — get_activities_comments
text: id identifier activity. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Activity Kudoers — get_activities_kudos

title: List Activity Kudoers — get_activities_kudos
code: get_activities_kudos(   id,   page = 1,   per_page = 30,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: List Activity Kudoers — get_activities_kudos
text: id identifier activity. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Activity Streams — get_activities_streams

title: Get Activity Streams — get_activities_streams
text: id identifier activity. keys Desired stream types. May take one following values: key_by_type Must true. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Authenticated Athlete — get_athlete
text: Returns currently authenticated athlete. Tokens profile:read_all scope receive detailed athlete representation; others receive summary representation.

code: get_athlete(scope = "activity:read", client = strava_client())

title: Get Authenticated Athlete — get_athlete
text: scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Athlete Activities — get_athlete_activities
text: epoch timestamp use filtering activities taken place certain time. epoch timestamp use filtering activities taken place certain time. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Athlete Activities — get_athlete_activities

text: segment_id identifier segment. start_date_local ISO 8601 formatted date time. end_date_local ISO 8601 formatted date time. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Explore segments — get_segments_explore
text: Returns top 10 segments matching specified query.

title: Explore segments — get_segments_explore
code: get_segments_explore(   bounds = NULL,   activity_type = NULL,   min_cat = NULL,   max_cat = NULL,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: Explore segments — get_segments_explore
text: bounds latitude longitude two points describing rectangular boundary search: (southwest corner latitutde, southwest corner longitude, northeast corner latitude, northeast corner longitude) activity_type Desired activity type. May take one following values: running, riding min_cat minimum climbing category. max_cat maximum climbing category. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
code: lhs %>% rhs

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: result calling rhs(lhs).

title: strava: Strava API — strava-package
text: Easily access data 'Strava API' https://developers.strava.com/.

text: Maintainer: Tyler Littlefield tylerlittlefield@hey.com

title: Create a strava client — strava_client
text: Create strava client

title: Create a strava client — strava_client
code: strava_client(   id = Sys.getenv("STRAVA_ID"),   secret = Sys.getenv("STRAVA_SECRET"),   token_url = "https://www.strava.com/oauth/token",   name = "strava-oauth" )

title: Create a strava client — strava_client
text: id Client ID. default, attempts pull ID .Renviron file. secret Client secret default, attempts pull ID .Renviron file. token_url Token URL. need changed. name Client name. default, 'strava-oauth' can name whatever.

title: Create a strava client — strava_client
code: if (FALSE) {   strava_client() }
